description: Calculation of travel time (in sec) between points based on the type of transport

blocks.name: getDrivingDuration
blocks.description: 小alculate the duration of travel by car

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The api key obtained from Mapbox

args.name: coordinates
args.info: Minimum 2 pairs of coordinates. Maximum 100 pairs.

blocks.description: 小alculate for car travel times with traffic

args.info: The api key obtained from Mapbox

args.name: coordinates
args.info: Minimum 2 pairs of coordinates. Maximum 100 pairs.
